member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.GetSummary(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all summaries in the database. No JWT required.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.GetOverview
member.summary: Get an Overview of the last time each of the actions were performed.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.GetGDD
member.summary: Get the Cumulative GDD Since the last application of PGR. Requires JWT.

member.summary: Get the date of the last action logged -Requires JWT.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.GetSummary(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a specific Summary by ID (not really useful yet) Requires JWT.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.PutSummary(System.String)
member.summary: OLD: Create a Summary record (min and max temperature) for a specific date (send in a YYYYMMDD string) Uses Stored Prod = TO BE DEPRECATED. Requires JWT.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.GenerateSummary(System.String)
member.summary: NEW: Generate a Summary Record for a specific date (send in YYYYMMDD as string) Requires JWT.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.PostSummary(System.Int32)
member.summary: OLD: Log an Action to the Summary table. Send in an Action Integer. Replaced by POST: /api/Summaries/SummaryAction. Requires JWT.

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.PostNewSummaryAction(System.Int32)
member.summary: NEW: Log a new Action to the Summary Table. TO DO: Account for Timezone Offset. Requires JWT

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.PostNewSummaryActionV2(System.Int32)
member.summary: NEW: V2 Log a new Action to the Summary Table. Requires JWT

member.name: M:TurfManager.Controllers.SummariesController.DeleteSummary(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a specific Summary by ID - Requires JWT.
